00000000          label:
00000000 00000000 ldc label
00000001 fffffb00 ldc  0xfffffffb
00000002 00000500 ldc  0x5
00000003          loop: br loop 
00000003 00000011 br loop
00000004 00000111 br next
00000005          next:
00000005 00000400 ldc loop
00000006 00000800 ldc var1
00000007          var1: data 0 
00000007 00000000 data 0x0
00000008 ffffff12 HALT
